channel.title: [PI] First click object
channel.description:
Whenever I stand away 1 step from an object an click it nothing happens, when I'm 2 steps away, it's operates the object and walks towards it. When second clicking from 1 step it works fine.
What could cause it to do nothing when first clicking it?
